description: This file defines Data Access Object (DAO) interfaces for the Room persistence library used in an Android application. It provides methods for querying, inserting, and aggregating transaction and budget goal data.

classes.name: CategoryTotal
classes.description: Data class representing total amount spent in a category

methods.name: allTransactions
methods.description: Retrieves all transactions ordered by date and ID descending

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts or replaces a TransactionEntity into the database

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Retrieves transactions filtered by optional type and category

methods.name: expensesByCategory
methods.description: Retrieves total expenses grouped by category

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts or replaces a BudgetGoalEntity into the database
